job_description:
Software Test Engineers / Software Testers

About KOTT Software:

KOTT Software is a globally recognized, ISO 9001:2015-certified company with a strong legacy in enterprise product development and offshore software services since 1997. With a dedicated international clientele, we specialize in delivering robust, client-focused business solutions across diverse industries. We partner with global organizations to enable and accelerate their digital transformation journey, leveraging deep domain expertise and enterprise application capabilities.

Opportunity:

Join us for the opportunity to work on niche US-based domains and industry verticals, collaborate closely with Fortune 100 clients, and contribute in an agile development environment involving technical reviews, quality assurance, and collaborative delivery.

Minimum Experience Requirement:

At least 1+ years of Software Testing experience in a Web application development environment.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Perform manual testing and related activities in a web-based application environment.
  • Work closely in an Agile development team environment and meet release plan schedules and patch management.
  • Develop and implement test plans, test strategy, test cases, and test reports for various testing types, including regression, functional, and performance testing.
  • Record and track defects using a web-based project management tool.
  • Set up and follow procedures for bug/issues/defects.
  • Responsible for testing all software products/projects.
  • May need to work in flexible hours to attend US/Europe client meetings.

Technical / Functional Skills (Must Have):

  • Prior experience in testing Web-based applications / Enterprise level applications and solutions is a plus.
  • Experience in Manual Testing, including writing test cases.
  • Sound knowledge of the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), software testing methodologies, and procedures.
  • Ability to identify test scenarios, create test plans, test strategy, and test cases, and execute them.
  • Sound understanding and experience in developing/executing test cases in an application development environment.
  • Knowledge of Quality Assurance/testing life cycle processes is a plus.
  • Minimum of 1+ years of experience in developing AND executing test cases in a client-driven environment.
  • Experience using any bug-tracking tool.

Preferred Skills:

  • Sound knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures.
  • Hands-on skills in Selenium, JMeter, or UFT automation tools in a live environment is a plus.
  • Ability to write scripts in Java or VB Script is an advantage.
  • Basic SQL concepts and query writing.
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to think ‘OUT OF THE BOX’.

Qualification:

B.E./B.Tech./M.C.A./BCA/BSc. with a Diploma in software testing or quality assurance.

Contact Information:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at manualtest@kottsoftware.com
summary: Software Testers with 1+ years experience needed for web application testing in an Agile environment. Responsibilities include test design, execution, and defect tracking.

ThinkBio.ai is a fast-growing health-tech company at the intersection of AI, precision medicine, and clinical innovation, with a vision to transform care delivery in oncology and beyond. We integrate advanced computational models with deep clinical expertise to build solutions for early detection, diagnosis, treatment personalization, and digital pathology workflows.

We are seeking a motivated Pathologist with strong foundations in pathology (oncology focus preferred) and a passion for AI, digital pathology, and translational innovation.

Role Overview

The Pathologist will serve as a key clinical expert for ThinkBio.ai’s pathology initiatives. The role combines oncopathology expertise with broader pathology knowledge, content validation, and knowledge creation to support AI-powered solutions. This position requires both academic rigor and innovation, working closely with clinicians, scientists, and engineers.

Key Responsibilities

  • Pathology & Oncology Expertise
  • Provide domain expertise in oncopathology (priority) while supporting other pathology areas as required.
  • Stay updated on latest advances in pathology (diagnostics, biomarkers, classifications, molecular assays).
  • Ensure accuracy and clinical reliability in pathology-focused content validation.
  • AI, Digital & Telepathology
  • Collaborate on projects in digital pathology, telepathology, and AI-driven workflows.
  • Validate AI model outputs related to histopathology, tumor grading, classification, and biomarker detection.
  • Content & Knowledge Development
  • Validate medical content (MBBS-level and above) for accuracy and clinical alignment.
  • Create pathology notes, structured resources, and knowledge graphs for disease segments in focus.
  • Reference standard pathology textbooks and guidelines in all deliverables.
  • Reporting & Collaboration
  • Provide weekly summary reports of activities and contributions.
  • Work as part of a multidisciplinary team with clinicians, researchers, and data scientists.
  • Deliver 1–2 online presentations per month to clinical and non-clinical teams.

Qualifications & Requirements

  • MD in Pathology (mandatory).

  • Familiarity with digital pathology, telepathology, and AI applications in pathology.

  • Excellent communication skills, with ability to present to both clinicians and non-clinicians.

Preferred Attributes

  • Strong academic referencing and ability to translate complex pathology into structured knowledge.
  • Team-oriented with a problem-solving and innovative outlook.

Why Join Us?

  • Collaborate with a diverse team of clinicians, pathologists, data scientists, and AI engineers.
  • Hybrid flexibility, dynamic work culture, and opportunities to lead knowledge-driven innovation.
  • Play a critical role in bridging clinical pathology expertise with digital transformation.

job_description:
SQL Database Administrator

As an SQL Database Administrator, you will be responsible for the setup, performance, integrity, and security of SQL Server databases. Your role will also include planning and development, as well as troubleshooting issues on behalf of the users.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Installation, Configuration, and Maintenance
    • Install, configure, and upgrade SQL Server instances.
    • Set up advanced features like Always On Availability Groups and failover clustering.
  2. Performance Tuning and Optimization
    • Monitor database performance and identify bottlenecks.
    • Optimize queries, manage indexes, and adjust server configurations for optimal performance.
  3. Backup and Recovery
    • Design and implement robust backup and recovery strategies.
    • Conduct regular testing to ensure data integrity and minimize downtime during failures.
  4. High Availability and Disaster Recovery (HA/DR)
    • Implement and manage HA/DR solutions such as Always On, clustering, and log shipping.
    • Ensure business continuity through disaster recovery planning.
  5. Security and Compliance
    • Manage user access, roles, and permissions.
    • Enforce security policies and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
  6. Troubleshooting and Support
    • Diagnose and resolve database-related issues.
    • Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems.
    • Collaborate with developers to support database-related operations.
  7. Automation and Documentation
    • Develop scripts and tools to automate routine administrative tasks.
    • Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation of configurations, processes, and procedures.

Additional Information:

  • Candidates who have passed any of the following Microsoft database-related certifications will have an added advantage:
    • Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate (Exam Code: DP-300 Administering Relational Databases on Microsoft Azure).

job_description:
Senior Engineer (Real Money Gaming)

We are seeking a Senior Engineer to join our Real Money Gaming (RMG) platform team, with a specific focus on RGS (Remote Game Server) game development. In this role, you will be instrumental in building high-performance, secure, and scalable backend systems. These systems will manage critical aspects of game operations, including game sessions, secure wallet transactions, game state management, and real-time events. Your contributions will directly support real-money casino games, ensuring adherence to compliance standards, promoting responsible gaming, and delivering seamless player experiences across both web and mobile platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, and maintain robust backend systems and APIs for RMG platforms and RGS games, utilizing Node.js and TypeScript.
  • Seamlessly integrate RGS games with the platform, covering session management, game state persistence, Random Number Generator (RNG) validation, bonus events, and the processing of wins and losses.
  • Design and implement secure wallet systems, including the integration of third-party wallet solutions, ensuring transaction integrity, atomicity, and auditability for all deposit, bet, win, and withdrawal activities.
  • Develop and implement advanced fraud detection, anti-cheat mechanisms, and responsible gaming features.
  • Build and maintain real-time communication channels between RGS, the platform, and frontend clients, leveraging technologies such as WebSockets and Pub/Sub.
  • Optimize backend systems for high concurrency, minimal latency, and maximum fault tolerance.
  • Collaborate on the development and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines, cloud deployments, and the overall microservices architecture.
  • Actively monitor, debug, and continuously improve system performance and reliability.
  • Mentor junior engineers, providing expert guidance on RMG/RGS backend best practices.

Required Qualifications:

  • A minimum of 6 years of backend development experience, with a strong preference for experience in RMG, online casinos, or sports betting platforms.
  • Demonstrated expertise in Node.js and associated frameworks like Express or NestJS.
  • Proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript for backend development.
  • Hands-on experience with various databases (SQL and NoSQL), caching layers (Redis/Memcached), and message brokers (Kafka/RabbitMQ).
  • A solid understanding of real-time systems (WebSockets, Pub/Sub, message queues) and high-concurrency architectures.
  • Deep knowledge of authentication, authorization, encryption, and security best practices, including JWT, OAuth, HTTPS, and secure key storage.
  • Proven experience with payment gateways, wallet systems, and transaction security protocols.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), containerization technologies (Docker/Kubernetes), and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Strong skills in debugging, profiling, and performance optimization.
  • Experience with RGS game server architecture and terminology, including game sessions, spin results, RNG validation, bonus/feature events, jackpot integration, and state persistence.

Preferred Skills:

  • Knowledge of RMG regulatory compliance requirements, such as KYC, responsible gaming, and anti-fraud measures.
  • Familiarity with integrating backend APIs with frontend platforms.
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack).
  • Understanding of microservices architecture as applied to casino platforms.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to send their CV to careersindia@rubyseven.com. If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, please share your updated resume with us at careersindia@rubyseven.com.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for the deployment, configuration, performance tuning, monitoring, and troubleshooting of Odoo servers (both community and enterprise editions). You will also collaborate closely with the development and functional teams to ensure system availability, security, and scalability.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Install, configure, and maintain Odoo servers (on-premise or cloud environments).
  • Manage Linux servers (primarily Ubuntu/Debian) that host Odoo environments.
  • Perform regular updates, upgrades, and patches to the Odoo system and its dependencies.
  • Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability of services.
  • Configure and maintain PostgreSQL databases used by Odoo, including backups and restorations.
  • Implement and manage Odoo multi-instance architecture (if required).
  • Automate tasks using shell scripting and other tools to improve operational efficiency.
  • Set up and manage SSL certificates, reverse proxy (Nginx), and domain configurations.
  • Implement security best practices including firewall rules, fail2ban, and user access controls.
  • Collaborate with developers to support deployment pipelines (CI/CD) and Git-based workflows.
  • Maintain documentation related to server configurations, architecture, and SOPs.

Preferred Skills:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
  • 2+ years of experience in system administration, with specific experience managing Odoo environments.
  • Strong hands-on experience with Linux (Ubuntu/Debian) server administration.
  • Solid understanding of Odoo architecture and PostgreSQL database management.
  • Experience with Nginx, Apache, and SSL/TLS configuration.
  • Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, or other container orchestration tools is a plus.
  • Good understanding of network security, firewalls, and access control.
  • Strong troubleshooting, problem-solving, and communication skills.
summary: Experienced Odoo Server Administrator needed for ERP infrastructure management. Responsibilities include deployment, configuration, monitoring, and troubleshooting on Linux servers.

About the Role

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Pre-Sales Business Analyst to play a key role in supporting the sales cycle by translating customer needs into clear, solution-ready requirements and documentation. The role involves close collaboration with the PMO Delivery Director (primary reporting), as well as providing pre-sales support to the Strategic Business Director and Sales & Customer Success Executive through requirement gathering, solution scoping, and preparation of technical inputs for proposals and demos. The ideal candidate will ensure customer expectations are accurately understood, documented, and aligned with product capabilities before transition to delivery teams, and may also support early delivery phases to ensure smooth implementation planning.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Pre-Sales Discovery & Requirements Gathering

  • Attend client discovery calls and demos alongside the Strategic Business Director or Sales & Customer Success Executive.
  • Capture and document business needs, workflows, and functional expectations.
  • Clarify objectives, use cases, and customer challenges early in the sales cycle.
  • Translate discussions into structured requirement notes or actionable briefs.

2. Solution Scoping & Technical Documentation

  • Develop preliminary solution outlines, scope summaries, and feature mappings.
  • Create draft Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) or Functional Specifications (FSDs) when required.
  • Produce workflow diagrams, wireframes, or configuration concepts with support from the designer team when needed (e.g., using Figma, Lucidchart, Visio).
  • Align proposed solutions with product capabilities and delivery feasibility in coordination with PMO.

3. Proposal & Technical Input Support

  • Contribute the technical and functional sections of proposals, SOWs, capability decks, and solution documentation.
  • Provide supporting material such as feature breakdowns, workflow references, screenshots, or demo visuals.
  • Coordinate with PMs, Product Teams, and Solutions Architects to validate effort, timelines, and scope.
  • Ensure documentation libraries, templates, and proposal-related assets remain current and accurate.

4. Demo Support & Client Workshops

  • Assist in tailoring and preparing demos based on client requirements.
  • Support solution walkthroughs by demonstrating functionality, workflows, or configuration concepts.
  • Capture questions, required modifications, and follow-up actions from demos or workshops.
  • Provide functional clarity to the Sales & Customer Success Executive and Product Delivery teams.

5. Collaboration with Sales, Marketing & Technical Teams

  • Work with the Sales & Customer Success Executive to align scope, requirements, and customer expectations.
  • Provide technical input to marketing collateral when showcasing system workflows or configurations.
  • Support design and content teams with diagrams, Figma links, functionality clarifications, or feature visuals.
  • Coordinate early solution feasibility with PMO, developers, and product architects.

6. Delivery Handover & Flexible BA Support (Post-Sale)

  • Prepare structured handover notes for PMO, BA, and delivery teams to begin implementation.
  • Clarify assumptions, workflows, deliverables, and effort during pre-kick-off activities.
  • Where needed, transition temporarily into a Business Analyst role during project initiation.
  • Support configuration workshops, requirement validation, and solution alignment during onboarding.

Preferred Skills & Experience:

Experience & Background

  • 2–4 years in pre-sales, business analysis, solution consulting, or functional coordination in a software/SaaS/IT environment.
  • Experience working with delivery, product, or technical teams to translate requirements into solutions.
  • Familiarity with software implementation lifecycles and client discovery processes.

Tools & Systems

  • Strong experience with Microsoft Office/365 (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).
  • Working knowledge of Jira or similar project/issue tracking tools.
  • Experience using diagramming or workflow tools (e.g., Visio, Lucidchart, Figma, Miro).

Skills & Capabilities

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to gather, structure, and document requirements clearly.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams (Sales, PMO, Delivery).
  • Good attention to detail and ability to handle multiple priorities.

Education

  • Bachelor’s degree in IT, Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.

Preferred:

Industry & Product Knowledge

  • Exposure to Lean, manufacturing, logistics, or process improvement environments.
  • Understanding of SaaS platforms, workflow-based systems, or ERP/MES/QMS tools.

Proposal & Demo Involvement

  • Experience contributing to proposals, solution decks, or SOWs.
  • Exposure to software demos, configuration showcases, or pre-sales workshops.

Collaboration & Market Alignment

  • Experience working with UK/Europe or international clients.
  • Ability to provide input into marketing or sales collateral (from a functional perspective).

Tools & Technology (Nice-to-Haves)

  • Familiarity with HubSpot or CRM platforms (viewing/updating deal notes, not ownership).
  • Experience using Figma or similar design reference tools (for workflows/UI mapping).
  • Awareness of AI tools (ChatGPT, Copilot, Jasper, etc.) for documentation support.

Methodologies & Delivery Context

  • Understanding of SDLC, Agile, or hybrid project methodologies.
  • Ability to work with PMs/BAs during solution handover or onboarding.

job_description:
Solution Validation Analyst

Company: Klystron Technologies Office: Nbr: 2210, Yamuna Building, Technopark Phase-III, 695583 Contact Email: jobs.in@klystrongloabl.com Closing Date: 27, Oct 2025 Job Published: 16, Oct 2025

About Us

Klystron Global is a leading provider of cutting-edge Digital Transformation solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses across various industries. With a focus on innovation and client satisfaction, we are committed to delivering exceptional technology solutions that empower organizations to thrive in the digital era.

Position Overview

We are seeking a proactive and results-driven Solution Validation Analyst to serve as the critical bridge between business needs and technical quality. The ideal candidate will be responsible for defining, analyzing, and validating robust technology solutions, ensuring they not only meet client specifications but also deliver maximum operational effectiveness. This role requires leveraging strong analytical skills and industry knowledge (preferably in the banking and financial markets) to capture requirements, design the optimal solution, and execute comprehensive testing—including test automation—to ensure flawless delivery and successful digital transformation.

Job Responsibilities

Solution Strategy & Business Analysis (Define the Solution) - Lead the requirements gathering process by working with clients to understand, document, and analyse business needs, ensuring alignment with project goals and objectives. - Evaluate and recommend process improvements for client systems (e.g., banking and financial systems) to enhance efficiency and meet regulatory compliance. - Collaborate with the development team to design and implement technology solutions that meet client specifications. - Prepare comprehensive business requirement documents (BRD), functional specifications, user stories, and process flow diagrams. - Serve as the strategic liaison between clients, project teams, and other stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and managing expectations. - Stay updated on trends and regulatory changes in the banking and financial services industry to proactively identify impacts on client projects.

Validation & Quality Assurance (Verify the Solution) - Design and execute comprehensive test planning and test case design, including defining tests for functionalities and performance. - Develop and maintain robust test automation frameworks and perform hands-on automation for frontend, API, and/or database systems. - Utilize automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Serenity BDD, REST API testing, and Cucumber. - Perform various specialized tests, including performance tests (e.g., using Jmeter), usability, and/or security tests. - Design the overall test strategy for a project. - Assist in creating test plans, perform User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and ensure the final product meets established requirements. - Use defect tracking/management tools such as JIRA and work with version control systems (TFS, git).

Key Skills and Experience

Experience: - 3-4 years of experience combining the functions of Business Analyst and Test/QA Engineer, preferably in the banking and financial markets.

Education: - Engineering Degree in any Discipline, Master in Computer Science, or a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology/related field.

QA & Technical: - Hands-on experience in test automation. - Intermediate programming experience in one or more of: Java, C#, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python. - Experience in a continuous integration environment (Jenkins/TeamCity, Maven).

Analysis & Methodology: - Strong knowledge of financial and banking operations, systems, and regulatory requirements. - Proficiency in requirements gathering, process mapping, and documentation techniques. - Familiarity with Agile and Iterative SDLCs and project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall).

Preferred Qualifications

  • Basic knowledge of SQL and/or data query languages.
  • Experience with data analysis tools and Business Intelligence (BI) software.
  • Experience with mobile testing, cloud migration testing, or data integrity testing.
  • Certifications such as CBAP or ACP are an advantage.
  • Experience with fintech or regulatory compliance projects is beneficial.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
  • Ongoing professional development opportunities.
  • A collaborative and innovative work environment.

Application

If you are a motivated and experienced Senior Solution Validation Analyst, we invite you to apply with your updated resume through jobs.in@klystronglobal.com with the subject line "Solution Validation Analyst” and ensure the following details are included in your email: - Current CTC - Expected CTC - Notice Period
summary: Seeking a Solution Validation Analyst for digital transformation. Responsibilities include requirements gathering, solution design, and test automation, preferably in banking/financial markets.

job_description:
Senior Associate – US Accounting and Compliance

Company: BEYONGEN ACUMEN (P) Ltd Location: 4th Floor, Amstor Annex, Plot No.5, Technopark Campus, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695581 Contact: careers@thebga.io Website: https://thebga.io Published: 15, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 31, Oct 2025

Job Title:

Senior Associate – US Accounting and Compliance (US GAAP | Federal & State Tax | Payroll Compliance)

Location:

Technopark, Trivandrum (Kerala) (On-site preferred; hybrid for experienced candidates)

Company Overview:

BEYONGEN ACUMEN (P) Ltd is a growing Indian firm based in Technopark, Trivandrum, specializing in providing accounting, tax compliance, and payroll support to U.S.-based clients. We focus on delivering accurate, timely, and compliant financial services that meet the highest U.S. standards. We work with clients across multiple states in the U.S., supporting them with Federal and State corporate filings, tax computations, payroll processing, and regulatory compliance, serving as their trusted offshore finance team.

Position Overview:

We are seeking an experienced Senior Associate – US Accounting and Compliance to manage end-to-end accounting, tax, and payroll functions for U.S. entities. This role demands strong technical knowledge of U.S. corporate tax filings, foreign-owned entity reporting (Form 5472), multi-state compliance (Form 335, RCT-101), and payroll tax processing (Forms 941, 940, W-2, 1099-NEC). The candidate will collaborate closely with U.S.-based CPA firms and clients, ensuring complete compliance and accurate financial reporting.

Key Responsibilities:

📊 Accounting & Reporting

  • Manage full-cycle accounting for U.S. entities, including journal entries, reconciliations, and monthly closing.
  • Prepare financial statements and trial balances under U.S. GAAP.
  • Maintain and reconcile A/P, A/R, and general ledger accounts.

🧾 Tax Compliance

  • Prepare and review Federal Corporate Tax Returns (Form 1120) and Partnership Returns (Form 1065).
  • Ensure compliance for foreign-owned U.S. entities through Form 5472 reporting.
  • Manage State filings, including:
  • Form 335 (State-level compliance returns)
  • RCT-101 (Pennsylvania Corporate Tax Return)
  • Other state-specific franchise and annual report filings.
  • Prepare Form 7004 for extensions and Form 1120-W for quarterly estimated tax calculations.
  • Assist with sales tax filings and multi-state nexus compliance.

💰 Payroll Processing & Compliance

  • Process payroll using Gusto, ADP, or QuickBooks Payroll.
  • Compute gross-to-net pay, including federal, state, and local deductions.
  • File all relevant payroll tax forms, such as:
  • Form 941 – Quarterly Federal Tax Return
  • Form 940 – Annual FUTA Return
  • Form W-2/W-3 – Annual wage reporting
  • Form 1099-NEC/MISC – Contractor payments
  • State withholding and unemployment filings (SUTA/SUI)
  • Reconcile payroll liabilities and ensure on-time remittances.

🧩 Compliance & Coordination

  • Maintain a compliance calendar for all Federal and State deadlines.
  • Liaise with U.S. CPAs and tax agents for reviews, filings, and audits.
  • Handle client correspondence related to IRS or State tax notices.
  • Ensure complete data confidentiality and secure record management.

Preferred Skills:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or Commerce.
  • 3–6 years of hands-on experience in U.S. accounting, tax, and payroll.
  • Strong knowledge of:
  • Forms 1120, 1065, 5472, 7004, 941, 940, W-2, 1099, 335, RCT-101
  • U.S. GAAP and Federal/State tax regulations.
  • Proficiency in QuickBooks, Xero, Sage, or Intuit ProConnect.
  • Excellent English communication and coordination skills.
  • High attention to detail and strong analytical mindset.
  • Experience in working with U.S. CPA firms preferred.
summary: Manage US accounting, tax, and payroll for US entities. Requires strong knowledge of US tax forms, GAAP, and payroll processing.

AI Model Integration & Optimization - Integrate APIs from multiple AI platforms (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Llama, Mistral, etc.) into scalable backend systems. - Build multi-model orchestration layers balancing cost, latency, and accuracy. - Fine-tune prompts, manage context windows, and implement RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) solutions for domain-specific use cases. - Optimize token usage, caching, and filtering strategies to enhance system efficiency and user experience.

Application & System Development - Design and implement AI-enabled workflows seamlessly integrated with web, mobile, or enterprise ecosystems. - Develop Python-based backends and APIs using frameworks like FastAPI, Flask, or Django. - Build and deploy microservices and cloud-native services leveraging Docker, Kubernetes, and serverless architectures. - Collaborate with frontend, DevOps, and product teams to ensure smooth feature delivery and deployment. - Monitor and evaluate AI responses through metrics, evaluation frameworks, or RLHF-inspired feedback loops. - Implement AI guardrails for responsible usage including bias detection, toxicity filtering, and compliance enforcement. - Debug and resolve performance or reliability issues in AI-powered production systems.

Innovation & Collaboration - Stay up to date with the evolving AI model landscape, exploring new models, APIs, and orchestration frameworks. - Experiment with multi-modal AI (vision, text, speech) for applicability in client scenarios. - Work closely with cross-functional teams to translate business goals into intelligent, automated features.

Primary Skills

  • Python backend expert: FastAPI, async I/O, API design, testing.
  • Production LLM integration: OpenAI/Anthropic/Gemini/Mistral; prompt and context strategies; RAG with a vector DB.
  • Cloud-native delivery: Docker, AWS (preferred), CI/CD, IaC basics (Terraform or Pulumi).
  • Data layer: SQL (PostgreSQL), caching/queues (Redis + Celery/RQ/SQS/Kafka).
  • Daily AI-assisted development (Copilot/Others) for coding and tests.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Expert in Python backend development with hands-on experience integrating AI models, building cloud-native microservices, and using AI-assisted coding tools for faster, smarter development.
  • Proven hands-on experience integrating LLM APIs (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Llama, etc.).
  • Strong expertise in AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.) as essential qualification.
  • Practical knowledge of LangChain, LlamaIndex, Codium or similar frameworks for AI workflow orchestration.
  • Understanding of prompt engineering, embeddings, vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS, pgvector), and RAG pipelines.
  • Strong background in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), containerization, and orchestration.
  • Deep understanding of REST/GraphQL APIs, async programming, task queues, and caching mechanisms.
  • Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis).
  • Experience using AI-assisted tools such as GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT API, AutoGen, or OpenDevin for coding and testing automation.
  • Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Pulumi).
  • Knowledge of data preprocessing, NLP/NLU, and model evaluation techniques.
  • Data Engineering & Processing, Data pipeline development, ETL/ELT processes, Batch processing and stream processing frameworks, Large-scale data handling with pandas, NumPy, Dask.

Preferred Skills

  • Hands-on with multi-modal AI (vision, text-to-speech, speech-to-text).
  • Experience with MLOps practices including CI/CD for AI pipelines, model monitoring, and drift detection.
  • Background in fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, or custom model training.
  • Familiarity with enterprise security standards (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2).
  • Contributions to open-source or personal AI-assisted coding initiatives.

Soft Skills

  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical thinking ability.
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration and communication skills.
  • Clear technical documentation habits.
  • Curious, experimental mindset with a drive to explore the next frontier in AI-driven development.

Preferred Skills Summary: Python, AI, FastAPI, Docker, SQL.
summary: Seeking a Senior Python Developer with 7+ years of AI/ML experience. This remote role involves building scalable, AI-integrated systems using modern tools and AI-assisted development.

job_description:
Junior Business Analyst at Lean Transitions Solutions

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) Location: Basement Floor, Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum , 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Job Published: 15, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 22, Oct 2025

About Us

Founded over a decade ago and headquartered in the United Kingdom, Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating for Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 software solutions and Leadership 4.0 solutions to world-class organizations, including Fortune 500 companies, with global locations in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico. We are dedicated to meeting client requirements and addressing industrial and manufacturing challenges with bespoke software solutions. Our culture is built on core values of Respect for All, Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, Inclusiveness, and Empathy.

About the Role

LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) to join our growing team. This role is ideal for individuals passionate about analyzing business processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering technology-driven solutions. The successful candidate will assist in requirement gathering, documentation, and stakeholder communication, while also supporting customer success activities. This position offers hands-on exposure to real-world projects, fostering a strong foundation in business analysis and enterprise software implementation.

Department: Product / Projects Employment Type: Full-time

Key Learning Opportunities

  • Exposure to real-world business analysis in enterprise SaaS projects.
  • Hands-on experience with requirement management and testing processes.
  • Practical understanding of Agile methodologies and client communication.
  • Opportunity to grow into Senior Business Analyst, Product Owner, or Project Manager roles with experience.

Key Responsibilities

1. Business Requirement Analysis - Work with Project Managers and clients to gather, analyze, and document business requirements. - Assist in preparing Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Specification Documents (FSD), and User Stories. - Translate business needs into clear, actionable requirements for technical teams. - Participate in requirement workshops, sprint planning, and review meetings. - Support gap analysis between business processes and system capabilities. - Assist in identifying, analyzing, and documenting change requests and their impacts on existing systems.

2. Process Modelling & Documentation - Map and document as-is and to-be processes using flowcharts, workflow diagrams, or tools like Visio, Lucidchart, or Draw.io. - Support process improvement initiatives and identify optimization opportunities. - Maintain traceability matrices to ensure full coverage of business requirements through design and testing.

3. Project Coordination & Testing - Collaborate with cross-functional teams including developers, QA testers, and business stakeholders. - Assist in preparing User Acceptance Testing (UAT) scenarios, test cases, and documentation. - Coordinate UAT sessions, gather feedback, and document results. - Help ensure project deliverables meet business expectations and quality standards.

4. Customer & Stakeholder Communication - Act as a bridge between customers and internal teams, ensuring smooth and professional communication. - Respond to client queries and support issues via email, chat, or support systems. - Maintain and update customer documentation, FAQs, and training materials. - Track, escalate, and follow up on customer requests until resolution. - Assist in creating training documents and user manuals for end-users.

5. Research & Continuous Improvement - Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify industry trends and product enhancement opportunities. - Stay updated on business analysis methodologies, tools, and frameworks (Agile, Scrum, Lean, etc.). - Contribute to the continuous improvement of internal processes and templates.

Preferred Skills

  • Degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Recently Graduated).
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Good command of English (verbal and written); ability to document clearly and concisely.
  • Basic understanding of business processes, software development lifecycle (SDLC), and Agile methodologies.
  • Proficiency in MS Office tools (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and basic familiarity with Jira, Confluence, or similar tools.
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.
  • Proactive attitude with a strong willingness to learn and adapt.
  • Strong passion and interest in the field.

To Apply: Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line "Junior Business Analyst".
summary: Seeking a Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) for a full-time role in Trivandrum. Responsibilities include requirement analysis, documentation, and stakeholder communication for SaaS projects.

job_description:
Junior DevOps Engineer

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Address: SBC Module 15, 2nd Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Job Published: 15, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 29, Nov 2025

Preferred Candidate Locations: Kerala, Tamil Nadu, and Karnataka Work Location: Trivandrum (Work From Office)

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive and highly skilled Junior DevOps Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services

  • Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads.
  • Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making decisions based on analysis.
  • Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools

  • Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues.
  • Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health.
  • Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation.
  • Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security

  • Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues.
  • Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic.
  • Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic.
  • Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols.
  • Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications.
  • Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains

  • Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging.
  • Understanding of Kubernetes concepts for managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues, including related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines.
  • Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management

  • Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging.
  • Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication

  • Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents.
  • Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers.
  • Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

Experience: 0.5 - 2 years Salary Package: 4 - 6 LPA
summary: Seeking a Junior DevOps Engineer for technical support on overseas projects. Responsibilities include troubleshooting cloud, networking, and DevOps issues in a 24/7 rotational shift environment.
